sentence.Network_en: "Where have you been?" he asked Blake accusingly.
He glanced at Juliet accusingly and she looked suitably abashed.
sentence.Network_cn: 他怪罪的一瞥,朱丽叶自然显得很窘.

sentence.Network_en: She pointed suddenly at me, and every one looked at me accusingly.
sentence.Network_cn: 她突然用手指了指我, 于是所有的人向我投来责备的目光.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(A) ... accusing 责难的 accusingly 责难地 accustom 使习惯于.
He looked at her accusingly ., 他怨恨地看着她.

entry.def: If you look at someone with an accusing expression or speak to them in an accusing tone of voice, you are showing that you think they have done something wrong.

example.ex: The accusing look in her eyes conveyed her sense of betrayal.
example.tran: 她责备的眼神中流露出一种被骗的神情。

auth_sentence.content: Your editorial line - he said, accusingly - is promoting sex.
auth_sentence.res_content: Your editorial line - he said, accusingly - is promoting sex.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Your editorial line - he said, accusingly - is promoting sex.

auth_sentence.content: I kept waiting for the health police to burst down the door shouting accusingly, You do get better!
auth_sentence.res_content: I kept waiting for the health police to burst down the door shouting accusingly, You do get better!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I kept waiting for the health police to burst down the door shouting accusingly, You do get better!

auth_sentence.content: The woman followed him for several yards, staring accusingly as he made his way through lanes of boxed produce.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The woman followed him for several yards, staring accusingly as he made his way through lanes of boxed produce.
